data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Dahod to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dahod, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 23,398 believers in the county of Dahod to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Dahod to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Dahod who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, I pray that the Naikda Kapadia people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Dahod access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Dahod, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Dahod, Gujarat, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: Dahod
location.people_groups_list: Bajania, Koli Patelia, Bhil, Bandhera, Mahratta Kshatriya
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bajania (30,000), Koli Patelia (463,000), Bhil (16,806,000), Bandhera (300), Mahratta Kshatriya (56,000)
